name: SoulHerder (pandele)
description:
After a major malfunction at TermoHellnergetica, three circles of hell have frozen. Lots of souls got out and they are lost in Purgatory. Now that heating was restored in Hell, it’s your job as a SoulHerder™ to find the lost souls and bring them back to their place of torment. Don't fail, SoulHerder™!

HOW TO PLAY

Bring the souls to the same-colored portals. The SoulHerder moves towards the mouse cursor. Use the Left Mouse Button to attract souls and the Right Mouse Button to scare them away.  Avoid the Soul Eaters (they steal your souls).
